name: 劉亮志
objective:
學習經濟理論的基本觀念，涵蓋個體與總體經濟學相關議題，包括市場如何運作，市場與福利，公共部門經濟學，廠商行為與產業組織，勞動市場經濟學，總體經濟學資料，長期實質經濟，長期貨幣與物價，開放體系的總體經濟學，短期經濟波動等主題。
This course provides the basic concept of economic theory, including microeconomics and macroeconomics. The topics are as follows: how markets work, markets and welfare, the economics of the public sector, firm behavior and the organization of industry, the economics of the labor market, the data of macroeconomics, the real economy in the long run, money and prices in the long run, the macroeconomics of open economics, and short-run economic fluctuations.

第 6 週  供需彈性與均衡分析 (1) 
第 7 週  供需彈性與均衡分析 (2)
